Title: 195: Inspiration from the Founder of the R Ladies Organization
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Founder of R-Ladies, Gabriela de Queiroz. You will hear about the R Ladies Organization and how it was founded, discuss the gender diversity problem in the data science field, and know the different skill sets Gabriela acquired during her previous careers that she was able to carry as she moved towards being a data scientist.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/195
